name: TARA International Consulting
goal:
We see our clients as partners and assist them in reaching their goals. With business units we are willing to share risks if they are willing to share the profit.

Our core activities are EU funded projects and all related activities (PPL, PCM, Procurement, Evaluation, Research, Training...)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Education, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Enlargement related to the Republic of Serbia and other Western Balkan countries in the accession process
